Reviews.Title: “Excellent price value”
Reviews.Author: Joel v
Reviews.Content: 5 star hotel clean comfortable friendly staff location excellent looking affordable stay beautiful borghese gardens close city center bit touristy track stay price value goes especially rome cant beat

Reviews.Title: “Not luxurious but a good experience”
Reviews.Author: Farehamvoyager
Reviews.Content: isnt five star hotel bargain choice quiet embassy suburb rome walk borghese gardens city centre liked period charm pleasant staff peaceful location near decent restaurants breakfast dreadful cafe nearby bus termini dont mess roman taxi drivers

HotelInfo.Name: Paisiello Parioli Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Via Paisiello 47, 00198 Rome, Italy
